item.title: Bodycam captures shocking police assault
item.description: Shocking bodycam video has been released that captures a South Australian man punching police officers, causing one to black out, during an unprovoked attack.

item.title: Major bank offers no-interest credit card
item.description: National Australia Bank will offer the nation’s first ever no-interest credit card, with the major bank looking to claw back younger customers shying away from the traditional lending product.

item.title: ‘Historic day’: SA bans single-use plastics
item.description: South Australia has become the first state in the country to ban single-use plastics, with the controversial bill passing parliament on Wednesday.

item.title: Coronavirus hits Sydney pub
item.description: Two people with coronavirus visited a pub in Sydney’s eastern suburbs while infectious, it has been confirmed.

item.title: The hidden side-effects of COVID-19
item.description: Two in five Australians have reported drinking more alcohol during lockdown, while the same proportion said they were drinking less, a new study shows.

item.title: Home buyers under pressure
item.description: Financially distressed mortgage holders pressing pause on their loans could be hit with higher interest fees from their banks if they seek further help because of the coronavirus pandemic.

item.title: Backpacker raped on remote beach
item.description: A rapist who attacked a European backpacker at a remote WA beach after she repeatedly rejected his advances has had his prison sentence doubled to four years following an appeal.

item.title: Hurricanes nab a star
item.description: Another BBL domino has fallen with one-time Melbourne Stars captain Peter Handscomb moving to the Hobart Hurricanes.

item.title: Truckie nabbed with cannabis, cash
item.description: A NSW man has been charged with drug trafficking and money laundering after police found a large amount of cannabis and cash in the truck he was driving.

item.title: Tom Hanks in Qld hotel quarantine
item.description: Hollywood heavyweight Tom Hanks is in hotel quarantine in Queensland after touching down on Australian soil this week.
